caption.title: LPS and CTB-specific antibody responses in DBS eluates and plasma in OCV recipients.
caption.p: The Bland-Altman analysis is shown for LPS-specific IgA (A), IgG (B), IgM (C) and CTB-specific IgA (D), IgG (E) and IgM (F) antibody responses between DBS eluates and plasma of OCV recipients (n = 17) at day 14.
